title: How should I write an article on the topic “blogging as a career option”? What should be the format? - Quora

response.answer_text: sonal. all i can say is that you write on a particular topic only if you have ample knowledge about the subject. and if you are confident then dont hesitate. just go ahead and write. in case youre nervous then maybe you should wait for a while before gathering additional knowhow on the topic. another theory is that write even if you know you are not fully versed with the topic. some advise such a strategy because practice makes one improve as time progresses. so it all depends upon you. maybe you could find similar articles on the internet, others have written. i wont be able to give as much advice as the kind of knowledge you would gain by reading similar articles. but remember. do not copy even a single sentence from any blog. so go ahead and be original. every person has a different outlook towards different matters and you would be able to publish a nice blog if you create unique content and present it in a way which encourages the readers to go through the complete content inside. as far as formatting is concerned - 10 Killer Tips: How to Format a Perfect Blog Post | Writtent [1] Footnotes[1] Blogs on Organic Web Promotion | Advantages of Backlinks | Our Blog
